Update: This is a basic keyboard for sure. No voice to text. Can't resize. No spelling suggestion for correction. No emojis except these :-0. Only options are vibrate & popup on keypress, clipboard, and language. BUT the letters are easy to see and it types well. When I need voice to text I can switch to the Google Voice typing option on my keyboard list. The no frills purpose is to provide a basic keypad without invasive permissions. For that I'll give +++thanks & *5* stars! 8-)
